messages.title: Natalie's Priorities for Sheffield
messages.content: Sheffield’s schools, colleges, hospitals, railways and buses should be properly funded and run for public good not private profit.

keyPolicies.policyDescription: Greens oppose privatisation of NHS, schools and public transportation services like the Sheffield Highways PFI deal Labour and the Lib Dems negotiated.
Schools must educate for life not just for exam factories. Oppose tuition fees – brought in by Labour, increased by the Lib Dems & Tories.

issues.brexitEurope: Only a Green vote will prevent climate chaos, transform Britain whilst remaining in the EU, and elect more Green MPs that can trust to keep the other parties honest.
issues.education: Schools must educate for life not just for exam factories. Oppose tuition fees – brought in by Labour, increased by the Lib Dems & Tories.

leaflet.personalStatement: This general election isn’t just about Brexit – this is about the country we live in.

contactInformation.address: Printed by Evolution Print at 17-35 Eldon Street, Sheffield, S1 4FS. Promoted by Samantha England of 73 Cowper Avenue, Sheffield, S6 1NH

endorsements.endorsement: This general election isn’t just about Brexit – this is about the country we live in. Only a Green vote will prevent climate chaos, transform Britain whilst remaining in the EU, and elect more Green MPs that can trust to keep the other parties honest.

images.caption: Your Green Party Candidate Natalie Thomas Sheffield Hallam
